item.title: Daft Punk announce new album tracklisting on Vine
item.description: French dance duo's long-awaited album 'Random Access Memories' will be released on May 21

item.title: Gold Panda unveils new track 'Brazil' and announces new album – listen
item.description: Producer will release LP 'Half Of Where You Live' on June 10

item.title: Deap Vally announce debut album 'Sistrionix'
item.description: Los Angeles duo will release their debut LP on June 24

item.title: Jack White to get fans to record themselves on vinyl
item.description: His Third Man Records label will open a special booth for Record Store Day

item.title: Kid Cudi rush releases new album 'Indicud'
item.description: The record - which features Haim, Kendrick Lamar and Father John Misty - is out now

item.title: Watch Steve Buscemi meet Vampire Weekend - and call them Vampire Holiday
item.description: The actor will be directing the band's live streamed concert later this month in New York

item.title: Mumford & Sons announce biggest ever headline show at London's Olympic Park
item.description: Vampire Weekend, Ben Howard and Haim also set to perform

item.title: The Gaslight Anthem and James to support The Killers at Wembley Stadium in June
item.description: The huge show takes place on June 22 at the iconic north London venue

item.title: Laura Marling unveils new song 'Master Hunter' – listen
item.description: The track comes from her upcoming fourth album 'Once I Was An Eagle'

item.title: Phoenix stream 'Bankrupt!' online ahead of official release
item.description: The band's new album is set for release on April 22 – the day of their London show

item.title: New 'Star Trek Into Darkness' trailer appears online - watch
item.description: JJ Abrams' sequel to his 2009 'Star Trek' reboot arrives in cinemas on May 9

item.title: Beady Eye reveal NSFW artwork for new album 'BE' and announce three live dates
item.description: Band to play three intimate UK dates in June

item.title: The Stone Roses reveal Shane Meadows 'Made Of Stone' documentary trailer - watch
item.description: Band will unveil their new film at Victoria Warehouse in Manchester on May 30

item.title: Bloc Party's Kele Okereke: 'I woke up with no underpants on in Playboy mansion'
item.description: Frontman reveals the strangest place he has ever woken up

item.title: Coldplay to release Mylo Xyloto comic book for Record Store Day
item.description: Book series reveals the story behind the album

item.title: Deftones: 'There will be a hole in our lives where Chi once was'
item.description: Band pay tribute to their late bassist

item.title: Robert Downey Jr reveals he earned $50 million from 'The Avengers'
item.description: The actor says he is 'what's known as a strategic cost'

item.title: Jarvis Cocker to release book on British folk clubs
item.description: 'Singing From The Floor' by JP Bean is the Pulp frontman's first acquisition as Editor-at-Large at Faber and Faber

item.title: QOTSA's Josh Homme and Mark Lanegan record theme tune for CNN food programme
item.description: Pair record theme song for 'Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown'

item.title: Paul Weller to perform Record Store Day instore in London
item.description: The Modfather will play Rough Trade East on April 20

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne admits he has been drinking and taking drugs for past 18 months
item.description: Iconic frontman reveals he is is now sober again and says he was "an asshole"

item.title: Grizzly Bear, British Sea Power, John Grant, James Skelly added to Latitude line-up
item.description: Richard Thompson, Tim Burgess, Austra and Ed Harcourt are just some of the latest additions to the Suffolk bash

item.title: Yuck frontman Daniel Blumberg leaves band
item.description: Frontman leaves London grunge rockers behind to focus on solo project

item.title: Miles Kane reveals the small venue which inspired Last Shadow Puppets song
item.description: Singer wrote 'The Meeting Place' with Alex Turner about Liverpool venue

item.title: Shakira sued for £65m damages by ex-boyfriend
item.description: Antonio de la Rua claims he talked the singer to recording her hit 'Hips Don't Lie'
